name: v0.6.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_aws", version = "0.6.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_aws",
    sha256 = "3a37da158933a9de7fb4e584c64eaa9c313dd23682e8d204c87552b5d29be68e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_aws-0.6.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/releases/download/v0.6.1/rules_aws-v0.6.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_aws setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_aws dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_aws//aws:repositories.bzl", "aws_register_toolchains", "rules_aws_dependencies")

rules_aws_dependencies()

aws_register_toolchains(
    name = "aws",
    aws_cli_version = "2.13.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: Use host platform to resolve CLI when cross-compiling by @HackAttack in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/106
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/108
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/107
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/110
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/111
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/109


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.5.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_aws", version = "0.5.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_aws",
    sha256 = "954b523a4688c35b0d813e79860ff381c978101e31f430a99842de81b4c136db",
    strip_prefix = "rules_aws-0.5.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/releases/download/v0.5.1/rules_aws-v0.5.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_aws setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_aws dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_aws//aws:repositories.bzl", "aws_register_toolchains", "rules_aws_dependencies")

rules_aws_dependencies()

aws_register_toolchains(
    name = "aws",
    aws_cli_version = "2.13.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: don't look for macos pkgutil on the PATH by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/81
* Run BCR pre-submit also on Bazel 8 by @hofbi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/93
* Fix warning in deps resolution by @hofbi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/94
* Ensure unique toolchain versions by @hofbi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/95
* fix: Avoid borking existing aws install by @HackAttack in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/98

## New Contributors
* @HackAttack made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/98

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_aws", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_aws",
    sha256 = "8f63c2a056dabcdf3a96a7ddcb11950595898efa6caf90995ad2cc8ea88ed6fa",
    strip_prefix = "rules_aws-0.5.0",

######################
# rules_aws setup #

# Fetches the rules_aws dependencies.

# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

rules_aws_dependencies()

aws_register_toolchains(
    name = "aws",
    aws_cli_version = "2.13.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* feat: allow s3 file to be copied to specific URI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/85
* chore: update bcr maintainer info by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/88
* fix: destination_uri_file: unbound variable by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/90
* add export_files by @blackliner in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/91
* Fix run_cli workspace run using bazel 8 by @hofbi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/92

## New Contributors
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/88
* @blackliner made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/91
* @hofbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/92

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_aws", version = "0.3.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_aws",
    sha256 = "ab795803d646949f2db9ad6467807d0bc9def64fe612b39ae1e64d3cfd0a5150",
    strip_prefix = "rules_aws-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/releases/download/v0.3.0/rules_aws-v0.3.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_aws setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_aws dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,

# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

rules_aws_dependencies()

aws_register_toolchains(
    name = "aws",
    aws_cli_version = "2.13.0",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: add BCR maintainers by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/48
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/55
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_py to v0.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/54
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v6 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/53
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/52
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_oci to v1.7.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/44
* feat: s3_sync rule for continuous delivery by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/64
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_py to v0.7.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/62
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/61
* refactor: remove dependency on rules_pkg by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/63


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_aws", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_aws",
    sha256 = "16701f5a26dadbfc6405b2dc330c7ed6a8573de42ef4938b85db7c17a4ac5c5a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_aws-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/releases/download/v0.1.0/rules_aws-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_aws setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_aws dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_aws//aws:repositories.bzl", "rules_aws_dependencies")

rules_aws_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/2
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib_gazelle_plugin to v1.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/3
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/10
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.32.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/8
* chore: change to non-free license by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/9
* Revert "chore: change to non-free license" by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/13
* chore: disable Windows platform usage and add better warning by @CaerusKaru in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/15
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v6.1.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/16
* feat: show how the AWS CLI can be included in a container image by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/17
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/27
* feat: introduce aws_py_lambda macro by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/30
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/29
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/21
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/20
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.33.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/28
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v6.3.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/26
* chore: update to Bazel 7 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/43

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/2
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/9
* @CaerusKaru made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_aws/commits/v0.1.0
